p: Neisseria meningitidis (LNP24198lux), a bioluminescent derivative of strain 24,198 (serogroup C), was cultured on Gonococcal (GC) Base (GCB) agar medium (DIFCO laboratories Detroit, MI, USA) containing the Kellogg supplements [ 16]. IAV, (A/Scotland/20/74 [H3N2]), adapted to mice, was prepared, stored in aliquots at − 80 °C, and thawed prior to infection, as previously described [ 7].
